name: Keep a record of your expenditures
description: The hardest part of saving money is often just getting started. Simple strategies to save money can be difficult to come up with.

name: Distinguish between wants and necessities
description: Is that 42-inch flat-screen television really necessary? When money is scarce, only spend what is absolutely essential.

name: Reduce your energy costs
description: When appliances and lights are not in use, turn them off. Invest in energy-saving light bulbs. Use a fan instead of air conditioning or a sweater instead of putting on the heat when possible.

name: Sell the goods you don't use
description: It's worth completing an audit of all your unneeded goods and selling them on an internet marketplace like Bikroy.com if you want to start saving money for your vacation right away.

name: Set Savings Objectives
description: Want to buy a property with a 20% down payment in three years? You now have a goal in mind and know how much money you'll need to save each month to reach it.

name: Identify and develop alternative sources of income.
description: Start thinking outside the box and you'll be able to simply raise your monthly savings commitment.
